column1: Engineering Control Systems and Instrumentation (with Placement) MSc
column5: September 2023 is the last intake for this course.This course is specifically aimed at International students, supporting those wishing to gain practical work based experiential learning. Together with studying your chosen course we are offering you the opportunity to secure a placement* for an additional 6 months, making the course 18 months in length. This allows students with limited experience to put into practice the skills and techniques developed throughout the Masterâ€™s degree.This advanced course has been developed in consultation with industry and is supported by our internationally recognised academic and research staff and the industry standard facilities based in our Centre for Precision Technologies (CPT).
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
